title: fed guinea fowl, brioche crumbs, gooseberries, asparagus, St George mushrooms and wild sorrel
description: This cheffy, spring-y recipe is a wild, seasonal food lover’s delight. Multiply the quantities by the number of guests for a dinner party to impress.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
400ml/14fl oz clear chicken consommé or strong chicken stock
large pinch finely shredded wild sorrel
